titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require as a condition of the earned income tax credit that an individual be allowed to engage in employment in the United States, and for other purposes.
EITC and ACTC Eligibility Verification Act
EITC and ACTC Eligibility Verification Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
EITC and ACTC Eligibility Verification Act
This bill denies the earned income tax credit and the refundable portion of the child tax credit to individuals who are not authorized to work in the United States.
